participant_2.background:
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
my wife does not like me anymore.
i m applying for publishing jobs.
sometimes i feel like i ve already been through life once before.

content.text: I usually go to the movies on Friday nights.
I have been to a movie in ages. I am actually applying for publishing jobs.
Oh, cool! What kind of books do you like to publish?
I like to publish books about travel. I have a journal that I fill with sketches and notes from my adventures.
Wow, that sounds really interesting. I love to travel, but I have never been able to sketch or take notes.
I love to travel too. It's one of my favorite things to do.
Where have you traveled to recently?
I just got back from Europe. I went to Paris, London, and Rome.
Oh, wow! That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
It was amazing. I'm already planning my next trip.
I hope you have a great time on your next trip.
